text:
October 14, 1953
Mr. Gene King
Program Director
Station WEEI
Boston, Mass.
Dear Genes
WonderfulI Congratulations2 Bon voyage and
let ns know what and how we can help. We have
lots of stuff. Will yon give ns your Paris
address so we can send you our Newslettay gnr?
all data on our exchange programs with European
stations and networks. Want to coordinate with
you all we can. You*11 probably be hearing
plenty from Sy Siegel on all this.
Regards,
KJSsdo
ccs HAEB Officers and Directors
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
(HOTEs Gene has just been named US 14 European
Chief. This is in reply to a note from him.)
